original_text: And not by his coming only, but by the consolation wherewith he was comforted in you, when he told us your earnest desire, your mourning, your fervent mind toward me; so that I rejoiced the more.
korean_text: 그가 온 것뿐 아니요 오직 그가 너희에게서 받은 그 위로로 위로하고 너희의 사모함과 애통함과 나를 위하여 열심 있는 것을 우리에게 보고함으로 나를 더욱 기쁘게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: And not by his coming only
wherewith he was comforted in you
when he told us your earnest desire
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희의 간절한 소원을 우리에게 말할 때

sentences.original_text: so that I rejoiced the more
